description: Medical care decisions that replace the old Medical Tent menu - Phase 6G migration

events.title: Surgeon's Treatment
events.setup: The camp surgeon is available. Professional treatment costs coin but heals faster.

options.tooltipTemplate: {CHANCE}% success (Medicine {SKILL}). Treats condition. Resets medical risk. Costs 100 gold.
options.resultText: The surgeon's skilled hands work quickly. Clean bandages, proper treatment. You'll mend well.
options.resultTextFailure: The surgeon does what he can, but your condition is stubborn. Partial improvement.
options.tooltip: 70% base success. Treats condition. Resets medical risk. Costs 100 gold.

options.resultText: You turn away from the surgeon's tent. The pain will have to wait.

events.title: Rest and Recover
events.setup: Sometimes the body just needs time. Extended rest might help you heal.

options.resultText: You rest. The fever fades. The wounds ache less. Time heals.
options.tooltip: +10 HP. -3 fatigue. -1 Medical risk. Free but slow.

options.resultText: There's too much to do. You push through.

events.title: Herbal Remedy
events.setup: A camp follower sells herbal remedies. Cheaper than the surgeon, if you know what you're doing.

options.resultText: The bitter tea works. You feel the fever breaking, strength returning.
options.resultTextFailure: The remedy helps a little, but not as much as you hoped.
options.tooltip: 50% base success. Partial healing. Cheaper than surgeon.

options.resultText: Better to suffer than risk some hedge-witch's brew.

events.title: Emergency Care
events.setup: Your condition is critical. Without immediate treatment, things will get worse.

options.resultText: The surgeon works urgently. It costs you dearly, but you'll live.
options.tooltip: Immediate treatment. +30 HP. Resets medical risk. Costs 200 gold.

options.resultText: You grit your teeth. The pain is bearable. Barely.
options.resultTextFailure: You collapse. The condition worsens. Stubborn fool.
options.tooltip: 40% to survive. Failure: -10 HP. +2 Medical risk. Risky.

options.text: I need to think about this.
options.resultText: The surgeon shakes his head. Time is running out.
